DOC.brief_title: Immune Response IXIARO Batch JEV09L37 Recipients Before After Revaccination
DOC.detailed_description: IC51-319 single-arm , open-label study investigates immune response subject undergo revaccination receive subpotent batch IXIARO JEV09L37 primary immunization . A total 50 subject receive primary immunization IXIARO batch JEV09L37 yet revaccinated .
